commentThread.commentText: She killed her f*cking pimp. Pimps are sex traffickers and they deserve to die

I once got kicked off a see saw by a mother ( we would always get off if a kid was hovering and wanted a turn, better yet we would sometimes stay on so they had someone to see saw with) XD I was so shocked because my friend swore under her breath and I was about to flip on my friend for swearing with children present. THEN THE OLD LADY SWEAR MUCH LOUDER, I was like okay thought we were dealing with an adult, not an overpowered 9 year old

replies.commentText: But when you say "not an overpowered 9 year old", that's being ageist towards 9 year olds.
meep meep an overpowered 9 year old? Geez this is the problem

commentThread.commentText:
The press has demonised teenagers.
The older generation simply let this happen.

I totally agree. Children, no matter what age, should have every right that an adult would have here in America, it is unconstitutional to deny children the same rights as adults, as all men are created equal. I pray children get the same rights as adults one day.

replies.commentText: +J Kirby Da Rock (PK Freeze) 50 years ago the rights of lgb t < /b>>people were not taken seriously but now they are, systemat ic ageism will be gone if people actually work to get rid of it like they did

commentThread.commentText: It's really pisses me off to see that discrimination against teenagers is not a big issue. It needs to be much bigger, the United State's laws in particular are fucking ridiculous. If they can be tried as adults, why don't they have the same rights as adults? I could go on forever, but I'll cut myself short by saying that it gives me hope to see that people are acknowledging that it is an issue.
